title: Sci-Fi Weapons - Laser Guns
description: 400+ cutting edge, futuristic weapon and laser guns sound effects!
longDescription:
Soundcloud Demo: https://soundcloud.com/soundresponse/sci-fi-weapons-demo


With its second official release 'Sci-Fi Weapons' Sound Response brings you a cutting edge, hi-tech, laser weapon Sound FX library ready for unleashing cybernetic hell! Months of field recording and sound design yielded 422 high quality futuristic laser weapon sound effects. A must have for anyone working on a video game, movie or any other project containing futuristic combat action scenes with laser guns and other types of futuristic weapons. With Sci-Fi Weapons at your disposal you’ll have one of the most powerful and advanced sci-fi weapon audio arsenals out there!


If you like the sound of Sci-Fi Weapons be sure to check out the much anticipated second installment Sci-Fi Weapons 2 for even more cybernetic combat mayhem!


Sound effects are separated into following categories:


1. Assault Rifles

2. Sniper Rifles

3. Machine Guns

4. Submachine Guns

5. Rocket Launchers

6. Loading FX

7. Scanners and Shields

8. Source Sound Accessories


Sci Fi Weapons Sound Effects List


NOTE: As a result of collaboration between Sound Response and Soundmorph this library is also a part of Soundmorph’s Future Weapons 3 library. If you have Future Weapons 3 library then you already have the included Sci-Fi Weapons sound library.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 422

Number of Audio Cues: 422

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: Some sound effects are set to loop

Minutes of audio provided: 13.52 min
